name: High Tower Software
overview: High Tower Software, Inc. provides network security solutions. It develops Cinxi security information and event management appliances to address network defense intelligence, as well as log management tools that improve network security. The companyâ€™s Cinxi security information and event management appliances enable analysis of computer network attack and exploitation activities, risk mitigation, flexible distributed deployment to accommodate networking environments, and log management and reporting to support historical analysis and audits. It provides Cinxi Enterprise, a security information and event management solution designed to meet enterprise-class log management, compliance, and security threat analysis requirements; Cinxi Midway, a 2U rack-mountable appliance designed for data collection, correlation, and storage requirements; Cinxi Ranger, a 1U rack-mountable appliance that offers security information and event management; and Cinxi Vault, an optional add-on storage component to accommodate long-term data retention. The company offers solutions for banking and financial, healthcare, government, and higher education industries. High Tower Software, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Aliso Viejo, California. As of February 17, 2009, High Tower Software, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of netForensics, Inc. On February 25, 2009, High Tower Software, Inc. filed a voluntary petition for liquidation under Chapter 7 in the US Bankruptcy Court for the Central District Of California, Santa Ana.

acquisition.source_description: netForensics Strengthens Leadership Position with Acquisition of the Assets of High Tower Software, Inc.
